Title: Fuzzy Task List
Description:
The fuzzy task list is for the kinds of tasks that don't have fixed times, such as:
* getting a hair cut 
* going to dentist 
* keeping in touch with old friends
A traditional calendar approach doesn't work for these kind of activities, as there's no impact if you miss the date by a few days.
The Project FuzzyTaskList is meant an open source version of the product Sciral Consistency.
